column1: Uchi////I feel a little bad about giving this place only three stars
column2: but I must.  The sushi was just ok.  First
column3: the selection wasn't very extensive and for some reason
column4: they do not carry toro.  Next
column5: the fish that I had didn't pop.  It wasn't bad
column6: but it was lacking in flavor
column7: both with the milder and stronger fish.  Even the fusion sushi for the most part lacked a lot of flavor.
